localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body:
The case for an economic boom in 2021 is growing:

1. Stocks at all-time highs

2. Housing mkt is booming

3. Fiscal stimulus back on the table

4. Vaccine is coming

5. CARES act helped many ppl repair their personal balance sheets

6. Top Gun 2 will finally hit theaters
blogPost.title:
The case for an economic boom in 2021 is growing:

1. Stocks at all-time highs

2. Housing mkt is booming

3. Fiscal stimulus back on the table

4. Vaccine is coming

5. CARES act helped many ppl repair their personal balance sheets

6. Top Gun 2 will finally hit theaters
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
2021年经济繁荣的理由越来越多：

1.股市创历史新高

2.住房市场正在蓬勃发展

3.财政刺激措施重新回到谈判桌上

4.疫苗就要来了

5.CARE法案帮助许多人修复了他们的个人资产负债表

6.《壮志凌云2》终于要上映了

2021年經濟繁榮的理由越來越多：

1.股市創歷史新高

2.住房市場正在蓬勃發展

3.財政刺激措施重新回到談判桌上

4.疫苗就要來了

5.CARE法案幫助許多人修復了他們的個人資產負債表

6.《壯志凌雲2》終於要上映了
